title: PVP.NET PATCHER KERNEL STOPPED WORKING!!!!!!!!!
body: {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} HI RIOT PLZ HELP!!!! LAST NIGHT I WAS WATTING FOR THE NEW PATCH(6.15) UPDATE, I OPENED THE PATCH LAUNCHER, IT WAS UNAVAILABLE, SO I CLOSED IT, BUT 30 MINS LATER I TRY TO OPEN THE PATCH LAUNCHER AGAIN, IT KEEPS SAYING PVP.NET PATCHER KERNEL STOPPED WORKING I TRIED EVERYTHING, EVEN REMOVE LEAGUE AND REINSTALL, IT DOESNT HELP. I REALLY LIKE THIS GAME, AND I REALLY WANT TO PLAY THIS GAME AS SOON AS PROSIBLE. PLEASE HELP RIOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
Since *Rineyy* has linked you the most relevant guides to solve this and you still have issues, I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech specialists. If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), it will provide the tech with most of the information necessary to work with you and resolve this quickly.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Alright Here It is , If you guys still getting this problem and try'd everything and it's still not working .
Local Disk (C:)/Riot Games/League Of legends/Rads/Projects/LoL_Patcher/Releases/0.0.064/deploy in that map you will find a exe. called LoLPatcher Press that and its done . PS sorry for my Bad enlish Have fun with it

[Visit Heimy’s Workshop to patch these issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c5/Heimerdinger_PiltoverCustomsSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120118075912

hey man so glad to see you, do you know how to fix my problem? i went to the website but i still dont know how to fix this, i uninstall the game and tried to install it again, but when i try to open the launcher, it keep saying pvp.net stopped working
Did you perform al the tasks listed in the article I linked?

i think i tried all of them, cuz i uninstall league so i dont have the game to repair, but still PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working, so i cant open the launcher to download league{{summoner:3}}  do u know whats the problem?    T^T
thanks for trying tho, thank you

Glad the game's working for you! Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg
its not working man,  me and my friends league r the same, we cant open the client, i hope riot can see this, i love league of legends.{{item:3070}}
please please please
i mean i cant download league of legends right now, cuz i cant open the patch launcher, please HELPPPP {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}

Go into the Riot Games Folder, then the League of Legends Folder.

You will see something called lol.launcher.admin. Run that, it should work just like normal.
i tried that before, but its not working, thanks for your reply tho{{summoner:7}} , league is working now, i think its the patcher's problem
Same ^-^, Lol Right

Glad the game's working for you! Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg

I hope this can help--
I know it's weird but try holding down on <numlock> while the LoL logo is up (or maybe before if it's not showing up).

Otherwise take a look at this forum article
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3856920
It might have a solution for you.

I'm honestly having the same problem with you dude. EVERY TIME I TRY TO OPEN THE LAUNCHER THAT ERROR POPS UP, 

**I EVEN DID A FRESH RESET OF MY COMPUTER AND STILL GET THE SAME PROBLEM**

I'VE TRIED EVERYTHING ALSO, I THINK IT'S THE PATCHER'S PROBLEM
me and my friends r having the same problem  just like you m8     {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}  plz riot fix this, i wanna play league
HELP SOMEONE PLEASEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
